pull_request.title: feat/119/collection hook
pull_request.body:
**What changes did you make? (Give an overview)**

- start adding use-local-collection test cases
- Finalize use-local-collection tests


**Which issue (if any) does this pull request address?**

Closes #119

commits.message:
Finalize use-local-collection tests

- need to add local-storage for filtering, and selection tools

issue.title: [Feature] Add local-collection hook
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
The local collection hook should provide an interface to interact with a collection, or array of local values.

Basically this hook manages an array of data supporting the following:

- Filtering (equals only)
- Sorting by attribute
- Searching (by using async fuse.js library)


This should be developed using TDD.

issue.title: [Chore] Look into storybook for nextjs components
issue.body:
**What needs to be done**
Nextjs components will be ignored for storybook, but maybe defining pre-existing pages in a lib should allow most components to be able to be rendered in storybook.
